article_metadata.author: Susan Adams

og.description: The earning potential for physician assistants, the bright career outlook and the number of job listings right now combine to make it the No. 1 job on a new list of the “best” jobs in America for 2015, put out by Glassdoor, a jobs website where users post salary information and company reviews.
og.title: The 10 Most Promising Jobs Of 2015
